title: Vietnam social media user penetration 2017 to 2023
summary: Overall Share of population has increased over the Year.
Share of population is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2022.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Share of population, of value 52.0 was reached at Year 2022
Minimum Share of population about 48.0 was reached at Year 2018
min_summary: In general Share of population has rose over the Year.
Share of population is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2022.
